ims_server

Interface IMS_Server_DataAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IMS_Server_DataBaseAccess

    public interface IMS_Server_DataAccess

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean changeStatus(java.lang.String name, int status)
      changes the status of the users in databse
      void close()
      close the connection to database
      boolean newUser(IMS_User user)
      add a new user to the database
      IMS_User returnOnlineUser()
      returns a list of all the users that are currently online
      IMS_User returnUser(IMS_User user)
      returns a user object from a database

    • Method Detail

      • returnUser

        IMS_User returnUser(IMS_User user)
        returns a user object from a database
        Parameters:
        user - only containes username and password
        Returns:
        a user object containg all paramaters that are applicable(name, launguage, ip, status, translated labels)

      • changeStatus

        boolean changeStatus(java.lang.String name,
                     int status)
        changes the status of the users in databse
        Parameters:
        user - object containing name and new status
        Returns:
        boolean true user status offline false user online.

      • newUser

        boolean newUser(IMS_User user)
        add a new user to the database
        Parameters:
        user - Object containing name password launguage
        Returns:
        true if user added to databse, false if user not added to database

      • close

        void close()
        close the connection to database

      • returnOnlineUser

        IMS_User returnOnlineUser()
        returns a list of all the users that are currently online
        Parameters:
        user - object containing name
        Returns:
        user object containing a list of all users online
